mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, o.* FROM (select o.orderId, o.userId, o.paymentId, o.deliveryId, o.addressId, o.stockId, o.orderDate, o.phoneNum AS orderPhoneNum, s.productId, s.exportDate, p.productName, p.modelId, p.releasePrice, p.img1, p.img2, p.img3, p.releaseDate, p.brandName, p.productSize, p.productCollection, p.regDate AS productRegDate, pay.paymentMethod, pay.bank, pay.accountNum, pay.accountHolder, pay.paymentDate, u.email, u.username, u.pwd, u.nickname, u.auth, u.phoneNum AS userPhoneNum, u.introMsg, u.reportCount, u.img AS userImg, u.lastDate, u.regDate AS userRegDate, d.deliveryStatus, d.trackingNum, d.regDate AS deliveryRegDate, a.userId AS addressUserId, a.recipient, a.addr1, a.addr2, a.zipcode, a.regdate AS addressRegDate from order_table o, stock_table s, product_table p, payment_table pay, user_table u, delivery_table d, address_table a where o.userId = u.userId and o.paymentId = pay.paymentId and o.stockId = s.stockId and s.productId = p.productId and o.deliveryId = d.deliveryId and o.addressId = a.addressId ORDER BY orderId desc)o) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rn, o.* FROM (select o.orderId, o.userId, o.paymentId, o.deliveryId, o.addressId, o.stockId, o.orderDate, o.phoneNum AS orderPhoneNum, s.productId, s.exportDate, p.productName, p.modelId, p.releasePrice, p.img1, p.img2, p.img3, p.releaseDate, p.brandName, p.productSize, p.productCollection, p.regDate AS productRegDate, pay.paymentMethod, pay.bank, pay.accountNum, pay.accountHolder, pay.paymentDate, u.email, u.username, u.pwd, u.nickname, u.auth, u.phoneNum AS userPhoneNum, u.introMsg, u.reportCount, u.img AS userImg, u.lastDate, u.regDate AS userRegDate, d.deliveryStatus, d.trackingNum, d.regDate AS deliveryRegDate, a.userId AS addressUserId, a.recipient, a.addr1, a.addr2, a.zipcode, a.regdate AS addressRegDate from order_table o, stock_table s, product_table p, payment_table pay, user_table u, delivery_table d, address_table a where o.userId = u.userId and o.paymentId = pay.paymentId and o.stockId = s.stockId and s.productId = p.productId and o.deliveryId = d.deliveryId and o.addressId = a.addressId ORDER BY orderId desc)o WHERE ${searchOption} LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%') WHERE rn BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum}
